feedback.text: I had a good time shopping for new clothes today. Matthew helped find me the right size of shoe, and even though it was his first day on the job, I can tell he is going to be really good at this.

My experience at Vans Glendora today was excellent. I only went in for a pair of socks, but this incredibly handsome and talented gentleman named Matthew convinced me to purchase over $500 worth of shoes

I was very disappointed today to hear that Matthew, my favorite Vans shoe salesman, no longer works here. Apparently he got a job doing software development, but this place just isn't the same without him
